titleStmt.title: By the Quene wheras the Quenes Maiestie vpon the earnest intention that she alwayes had and yet hath, to mainteyne the good and auncient amitie betwixt her Maiestie and the kyng of Spayne ...
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1558-1603 : Elizabeth I)
Elizabeth I, Queen of England, 1533-1603.

publicationStmt.publisher: Imprinted by Richarde Iugge and Iohn Cawood, Printers to the Quenes Maiestie,

notesStmt.note: Leaf 1 line 1 ends "yet"; leaf 2 last complete line ends "myght".
For protection of Spanish and Scottish ships.
"Yeuen at the Maiesties Castle of Windsor the xviii. day of February, in the sixth yere of her highnes raigne."
Reproduction of original in: Harvard University. Library.
